ISSUE.TITLE: Launches query (v4) with populate 'crew' options doesn't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I use the query for launches for my app as follows: ``` { "query": "", "options": { "populate": [ // other populate options works correct { "path": "crew", "select": "-launches" }, ], "pagination": false } } ``` Some days ago it starts to send broken response without crew populated on;ly with id in array. Is it error or feature mentioned in https://github.com/r-spacex/SpaceX-API/issues/842? Should I update my app with v5 launches query?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #857 add query formatting for v4 launches
